Class AZCategoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

  • class AZCategoryAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<AZCategoryAdapter.ViewHolder>
    AZCategoryAdapter implements the adapter for the RecyclerView in AZCategoryFragment.

    barango
